name: Fatal Affair: A Betrothal of Thorns [Demo]
name_original: Fatal Affair: A Betrothal of Thorns [Demo]
description:
Welcome to the  halls of the Fae King's Spring Palace, Princess. A world of enchantment, whimsy, and murder awaits.

Good luck.


A war can only wage so long before it burns out.

Having battled for over two hundred years, the humans and the fae know this best of all--and as the dutiful Princess of Tirandjin, your betrothal to the fae prince will bring an end to the conflict. 

However, just as you've accepted your fate, an important official is found murdered--and you might just be the next target.

As you navigate the halls of the Spring Palace, you quickly realize there's no easy way to distinguish friend from foe.

Will you seek safety in the arms of a daring knight captain? Will you follow a path of endless secrets as you befriend a mysterious fae? Or will you fulfill your duty and wed yourself to the fae prince?

Though your future is unwritten, be warned: every choice comes with a consequence. Every crown, a price.

What are you willing to sacrifice?


The Princess of Tirandjin (Nameable MC) - As a dutiful princess, you don't ask questions. You don't cause problems. And you certainly don't involve yourself in murder plots... right?

Ferrauo the Fae Prince - Gentle, shy, and completely unlike most fae within the Spring Palace, Ferrauo is Fae King Aurus's only son–and the heir to the Fae Kingdom.

Yannick the Fae Knight Captain -  Dependable, flirty, and skilled with a sword, Yannick is the youngest fae to be made Knight Captain. He has a love (okay, obsession) for all things human.

Kieran the Mysterious Fae - Cranky, sarcastic, and all around unpleasant, Kieran is a mysterious fae who seems to have enemies around every corner...

And an entire court full of whimsical and engaging characters each with their own political goals and motivations. 


PROTOTYPE DEMO FEATURES

  • The first 9K words of the prologue (Part 1 & 2)
  • A nameable protagonist
  • A meeting with the first love interest: the shy and uncertain Prince Ferrauo: tease him, reassure him, or insult him
  • 8 choices: Flavor, personality, and branching
  • Partially customized UI
  • SCANDALOUS MURDER!

THE NEXT UPDATE WILL FEATURE:

  • Parts 3-5 of the Prologue (about 15K more words)
  • A fully custom UI
  • 8 more choices!
  • An official introduction to the other two love interests

Fatal Affair is in active production by Studio Ghost Legs, a team of three lovely and mysterious ghosts:

notafish - Narrative Designer, Lead Writer, Logo & UI Designer

DeviousXevious - Lead Programmer, Editor, & Audio Specialist

ChoBug (a social media ghost through and through) - Lead Artist, Sprite Designer, & Editor
